group_1.textRight: I'm going out for a bit.

group_1.textLeft: You're already home from school,@so you should change before you go back out.
And don't stay out too late.

group_1.textRight: Yeah yeah, I know...

group_1.narration: I don't have to fall in love,@it's got nothing to do with me.
Like Kanagi says, it's something@that can leave your heart open to harm.
But, I've got this@vague fuzzy feeling in my chest@that I want to know more about...

group_1.textRight: Meeel!
Good, there you are.@[chara:800600:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:300701:cheek_0][chara:800600:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:800600:lipSynch_1]I told you to come home early.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry...

group_1.textRight: Hm?
Oh, were you still thinking about this morning?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:303750:lipSynch_1]Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Sorry.

group_1.textLeft: Eh...@Mom, why are you apologizing?

group_1.textRight: Because I was trying to teach you@how to make chocolate.
But I might have just been@sticking my nose into your business.
Don't worry, I won't get in your way.

group_1.textLeft: No, no...I...

group_1.textRight: But you're still my daughter,@so let me support you in secret.

group_1.textLeft: I'm telling you it isn't like that!

group_1.textRight: Don't you have someone that you like?

group_1.textLeft: I've never had anyone that I liked...
So I'm wondering what love is@and why it's so important...
I talked to my older friends and when I started to@think about it, it kind of boggled my mind...

group_1.textRight: Ah, so that's what it was.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
What do you think, Mom?
What does love feel like,@and why is it so important?

group_1.textRight: What did your friends say?

group_1.textLeft: That it's a sensation of being drawn toward@someone you can be wedded to for life.

group_1.textRight: Hmm...that might be right.

group_1.textLeft: Was it the same for you?

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's right.
But that was a long time ago,@and my feelings now are quite different.

group_1.textLeft: Then, what are they?

group_1.textRight: Hmm...
...Take a look at the lake.
To me, love is that precious feeling when you@come face to face with your greatest treasure.

group_1.textLeft: A treasure?

group_1.textRight: That's right.

group_1.textLeft: Wait...me?

group_1.textRight: If I hadn't met your father,@you wouldn't be here.

group_1.textLeft: Waaah, that's embarrassing!
Aren't you embarrassed to say to your daughter?!

group_1.textRight: Hm, not really?

group_1.textLeft: No way no way, you're impossible!@I'm going home!

group_1.textRight: Mel, wait!

group_1.textCenter: That's gross, it's creepy, it's embarrassing!
Hold up, why am I smiling?!
